0.question: Pedro had some marbles. He gave 2 away and had 9 left. How many marbles did Pedro have at first?

1.question: A full box has 15 pieces of chalk. My box only has 5 pieces. How many pieces of chalk are missing?

2.question: Nicholas is 11 years old today. How old was Nicholas 5 years ago?

3.question: 8 children were playing in the park. 5 children joined them. How many children were playing in the park then?

4.question: Rachel invited 11 friends to her birthday party. 8 friends came. How many friends did not come?
